overview: In 1840, Sam Lash heads west for adventure. He meets up with some Mountain Men, and they head for the Rockies to trap beavers and cats. In Taos he meets Lola, a beautiful Mexican girl from a proud and rich family. They fall in love and he persuades her to elope with him. After they get married, Sam is torn between his love for Lola and his yearn for traveling.
tagline: Lupe, the tempestuous, the unconventional, the firebrand. Cooper, wild riding romantic mountain man who traps wolves and women!
title: Wolf Song
